page.title: 14Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In the past{Scouts, Cubs, Brownies, {Guides, weekly dances and Whist drives catered for the needs of all ages,the {local pub}being a men's stronghold offering{darts,dominoes,shove- {halfpenny}and friendship.Today's trend is to travel to the{Leisure Centres}at Stroud and Cirencester for the many activities available.These include {swimming,tennis,badminton,gymnastics, {trampolining,and ballet. A variety of individual activites take place from the home, such as {painting,craft work,walking and {riding. The home computer}is now competing with outdoor activities as a leisure activity. Some children still attend Cub,Brownie and Guide activities and the Scout movement is firmly supported in the area.
